title: Coronary counter attack
brief_description: Outlines heart disease risk factors, and argues that aerobic exercise will reduce these risks. Gives guidelines for such selected activities as jogging, swimming, bicycling, walking, rope jumping and cross-country skiing. Featuring Dr Kenneth H. Cooper.
